force.message:
🚨 ശ്രദ്ധ: വർദ്ധിച്ച ഡിമാൻഡ്, ആക്‌സസ് മാനേജ്‌മെന്റിനുള്ള നിർബന്ധിത സബ്‌സ്‌ക്രിപ്‌ഷനിലേക്ക് നയിച്ചു..

🔗 താഴെയുള്ള '🪐 ചാനലിൽ ചേരുക 🪐' ബട്ടൺ ഉപയോഗിക്കുക & നിങ്ങൾ ഉപയോഗിച്ചുകഴിഞ്ഞാൽ '♻️ REFRESH ♻️'!
force.fool: മുന്നോട്ട് പോകാൻ മുകളിലുള്ള ബട്ടണിൽ ക്ലിക്ക് ചെയ്ത് ചാറ്റിൽ ചേരുക! 😎

timeLimit.message:
`⚠️ നിങ്ങൾ പതിവായി സന്ദേശങ്ങൾ അയയ്ക്കുന്നു.`
`ദയവായി %s സെക്കൻഡ് കാത്തിരിക്കുക. ⌛🤐`

0.message: 👋 File Guardian ബോട്ടിലേക്ക് സ്വാഗതം! 📁 FileShare Bot ഉപയോഗിച്ച്, നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ഫയലുകളും പ്രമാണങ്ങളും മറ്റും എളുപ്പത്തിൽ പങ്കിടാനും നിയന്ത്രിക്കാനും കഴിയും. നിങ്ങൾക്ക് ഒരു ഡോക്യുമെന്റോ ഫോട്ടോയോ മറ്റേതെങ്കിലും ഫയലോ അയയ്‌ക്കണമെന്നുണ്ടെങ്കിൽ, ഞങ്ങളുടെ ബോട്ട് നിങ്ങളെ പരിരക്ഷിച്ചിരിക്കുന്നു. അധിക സുരക്ഷയ്‌ക്കായി നിങ്ങൾക്ക് പാസ്‌വേഡ് പരിരക്ഷയും ചേർക്കാം. ലളിതമായി ആരംഭിക്കുക. നിങ്ങൾ പങ്കിടാൻ ആഗ്രഹിക്കുന്ന ഒരു ഫയൽ അയയ്ക്കുന്നു powered by: @ilovepdf_bot ❤️

1.message: 🤖 Discover DataGuard - Your Ultimate Privacy Shield! 🔒 Tired of your data going public? Look no further! DataGuard is your solution to safeguarding information. Generate unique links for your text, files, gifs, stickers, and more! Worried about unauthorized access? Add an extra layer with personal passwords – clients will need it to unlock the treasure. This bot is simpler than you think! Just forward anything you want to protect, and witness the magic unfold. Your privacy, your control. 🔐✨

2.message: 🤖 Introducing FIleShareBot - Your File Batch Wizard! 📦 Ever wished to combine multiple files into one neat package? Now you can with the `/batch` command! Just send it in my private chat, then forward the first file from any channel and the last message of the batch from the same channel. Voila! I'll weave them into a single file, generating a unique link for your convenience. If it's a private channel, ensure I'm an administrator for the magic to unfold. Simplify your sharing, one batch at a time! 🌐✨

settings.message: ⚙️ SETTINGS: 🔐 SET PASSWORD: Enhance additional security by setting a password for your data. This can be applied to all formats, including text, stickers, and more. 🚫 CAN'T FORWARD: Restrict the forwarding of messages to maintain privacy and control the flow of information in your bot. 📸NO CAPTIONS: Customize media sharing by removing captions from files, providing a cleaner and more streamlined user experience. 👤 WITHOUT QUOTES: Tailor your bot's appearance by removing author information from messages, offering a sleek and minimalist interface. 🚷 ACCESS CLOSED: Customize access to features based on user roles or conditions, allowing you to control and limit certain functionalities. 🗑️ AUTO-ERASE: Enable the auto-erase function to seamlessly remove messages, enhancing data control and privacy within your bot.
settings.errorLink:
⚠️ Showing some error!

Please check the link again. 🚫🌐
settings.noAccess:
🚫 Temporarily Admin Disabled This File 📂

Contact the link creator or try again later. 🔄📞
settings.passUpdated: 🔒 Password Updated... Click the button below to find out! 🤫👇
settings.askPassword: This file is secure with a password 🔒. Use the button below if you have the password to access it. 👇🔑

lang.select: Now, select a language depending on your choice: 🌐🗣️
lang.already: Already, you are using this Language 🙇🏻

batch.new: Use '📢 Batch From Channel 📢' to group a set of messages from a channel. Simply send the first and last message, and it will batch the first 100 messages if the number of messages between the first and last exceeds 100. On the other hand, '👤 Batch My Message 👤' lets you batch individual messages you send one by one, with a maximum limit of 10 messages
batch.inProgress: A batch job is currently in progress... ⌛🔄
batch.sendFisrtMsg:
Now forward me the first message of the batch file from a public channel

or grant me admin access in the channel and forward. 🔄📤
batch.sendLastMsg: Now send me the last message to get batched. 📤 NB: Both messages must be from the same channel. 🔄>
batch.lastMsgError: Send me the last message to be forwarded. 📬 NB: - It must be from the same channel. - This message must be after the first message. 🔄
batch.sendMessage:
Send me some messages to get batched. 📤

/batch: to batch current data
Current data in Queue 🔄:
batch.forwardIt:
Ooh, I'm waiting for a forward message from some public channel

or a channel where I am an admin. ⏳📤
batch.procCancel:
All queues are cleared,

the current process is canceled. 🙃
batch.adminReq: Bot must be an admin in the channel; otherwise, it can't access the files. 🤖🚫

generate.privLink:
Good news! Your protected link is ready for sharing.. 🌐🔒

NB: Always remember, only the one who knows the password can access this data 🔑
generate.publLink:
Good news! Your public link is ready for sharing.🌐🔗

NB: Always remember this is a public link anyone can use this link to fetch data 🚫🔒

duration.message:
Now, select a time duration for the message.

It will delete the message after the specified time. ⏰🚫
